t: Amazon in White House crosshairs over report of displaying tariff costs | Reuters
s: April 29, 2025 - Amazon said on Tuesday its low-cost Haul unit had considered listing import charges for goods in light of new U.S. tariffs but denied looking at such a plan for its main website, after the White House accused it of a hostile political act.

t: White House-Amazon Spat Culminates in Trump Calling Bezos ‘Very Nice’ - The New York Times
s: April 29, 2025 - The White House press secretary, Karoline Leavitt, attacked the retail giant over a report that suggested Amazon would highlight tariff-related price increases. Amazon said it was “not going to happen.”

t: Trump Files MAGA Trademark as Amazon Store Debuts
s: Trump expands MAGA with a new trademark covering lifestyle products, coinciding with the launch of his official Amazon store featuring 54 branded items.

t: They Built a Business, and a Life, on Amazon. Tariffs Are Putting It at Risk.
s: April 18, 2025 - An Illinois couple who sell party supplies on Amazon have been frantically trying to understand and adapt to new costs caused by President Trump’s tariffs.

t: Amazon tariff charge: Trump called Jeff Bezos after learning company considered breaking out added cost | CNN Business
s: April 30, 2025 - The White House took aggressive aim at Amazon, which confirmed Tuesday it was considering displaying the added cost of President Donald Trump’s tariffs on certain items.

t: Trump praises Bezos after Amazon denies plan to show tariffs’ costs - The Washington Post
s: April 29, 2025 - Amazon said staff had considered listing tariff costs on its Temu competitor, Amazon Haul, but that it’s “not going to happen.” The Trump administration had condemned the idea.

t: Trump-Bezos call sets stage for tense earnings report from Amazon
s: April 30, 2025 - Amazon's financials will land days after President Trump complained about a report that the company was considering displaying tariff costs on listings.

t: Trump dials up Bezos amid ‘hostile and political’ tariff fight with Amazon - POLITICO
s: April 29, 2025 - An Amazon spokesperson said the company was not going to display tariff costs next to products, following a report it would do so earlier Tuesday.
